name: Set Parameters
description: Set application-specific parameters for Docker Compose

parameters.name: Docker Compose File
parameters.description: Docker Compose YAML file (upload). Upload this file first to extract service information.

parameters.name: Environment File (.env)
parameters.description: Environment variables file (.env) (upload, optional). Upload after compose file if needed.

parameters.name: Hostname
parameters.description: Hostname for the Docker Compose container. Required when creating an application from the docker-compose framework.

parameters.name: Compose Project Name
parameters.description: Project name for Docker Compose (used for named volumes and directory). Defaults to hostname if not provided.

parameters.name: OS Type
parameters.description: Operating system type for the container
